name: eleemosynary
content:

relating to or depending on charity (= help given freely to people who are in need, and organizations that provide this help): They were receiving eleemosynary aid. Philanthropy in business is never truly eleemosynary. Synonym
charitable
More examplesFewer examplesHe was accused of using an eleemosynary organization to obtain financial benefit for himself.The university is an eleemosynary charitable foundation.As a private eleemosynary corporation, the college is independent of the state. We need to ensure that there is adequate support of the state's eleemosynary and educational institutions.
